alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 6:23AM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Oregon Lower Treasure Valley zone. In Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID and Owyhee Mountains zones. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially in the southern portion of the Lower Treasure Valley north up to and including I-84.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
